process.name: Big Queue Builder
process.narrative: Process to build a queue with a lot of queue items. It can be set to exception / complete / defer a number of these items randomly, according the weights given.

input.name: SkippedWeight
input.narrative: Proportionally how many items should be skipped

input.name: CompletedWeight
input.narrative: Proportionally how many items should be completed

input.name: ExceptionedWeight
input.narrative: Proportionally how many items should be exceptioned

input.name: DeferredWeight
input.narrative: Proportionally how many items should be deferred

input.name: Start Number
input.narrative: What number should this large queue start from

input.name: End Number
input.narrative: What number should this large queue stop at

input.name: Add Items
input.narrative: Flag to indicate if items should be added or just worked

input.name: Process Items
input.narrative: Flag to indicate whether the big queue should be processed according to the given weights

input.name: Process Items From This Session Only
input.narrative: Flag to indicate that, when processing items, only those added in this session should be worked
input.stage: Process Only Items From This Session

input.name: Tag Items
input.narrative: Flag to indicate whether the queue's items should be randomly tagged or not

input.name: Queue Name
input.narrative: The name of the queue to create - defaults to 'Big Queue'

input.name: Queue Name
input.narrative: The name of the queue to be created

input.name: Key Field
input.narrative: The key column to use in the collection which makes up a queue item

input.name: Max Attempts
input.narrative: The maximum number of retry attempts for the queue. Default: 5

input.name: Start Index
input.narrative: The index that the collection should be built from

input.name: End Index
input.narrative: The last index that should be added to the collection

output.name: Output
output.narrative: The collection which has been built

input.name: Queue Name
input.narrative: The name of the queue to add items to

input.name: Data
input.narrative: A collection containing the data, one row for each item to be added

input.name: Defer Until
input.narrative: Optionally, the date/time the new item(s) should be deferred until

input.name: Priority
input.narrative: Optionally, the priority for the new item(s). Lower numbers represent higher priorities. The default is 0.

input.name: Tags
input.narrative: Optionally, a semi-colon-separated set of tags to apply to the queue item(s)

input.name: Status
input.narrative: Optionally, the initial status required of the work queue item(s)

output.name: Item IDs
output.narrative: The IDs of the items which have been added to the queue, in the order of the collection of data passed that was input

input.name: Queue Name
input.narrative: The name of the queue to add items to

input.name: Key Filter
input.narrative: Optionally, a key value to filter by. Only items with this key value will be considered.

input.name: Tag Filter
input.narrative: Optionally, a tag mask to filter by. The tag should be in the format : ."+wanted tag; -unwanted tag ; other wanted tag". Wildcards can be used in the form of '*' or '?' for 'any chars' and 'any single char' respectively

output.name: Item ID
output.narrative: The ID of the item retrieved - empty if there are none available.

output.name: Data
output.narrative: The data associated with the item - a single collection row.

output.name: Attempts
output.narrative: The number of attempts already made to work this item.

input.name: Item ID
input.narrative: The ID of the item to defer

input.name: Until
input.narrative: When to resume processing the case

input.name: Item ID
input.narrative: The ID of the item to mark

input.name: Item ID
input.narrative: The ID of the item to mark

input.name: Exception Reason
input.narrative: A description of the reason for the exception

input.name: Retry
input.narrative: Whether or not to retry the item, up to the maximum number of attempts specified for the queue. Optional - if not specified, the item will be retried

input.name: Collection Name
input.narrative: The name of the collection to be modified

input.name: Item ID
input.narrative: The ID of the work queue item which should be unlocked

output.name: Unlocked
output.narrative: Whether the item was unlocked as a result of this action or not. If the item had finished being worked elsewhere before this action had run, this will be 'False'

field.name: Tag Name
field.description: The name of the tag to apply

field.name: Percentage
field.description: The percentage chance of the tag being applied

input.name: Item ID
input.narrative: The ID of the queue item to add the tag to

input.name: Tag
input.narrative: The tag to add to the item. Note that this cannot start with a '+' (plus) or '-' (minus) character, and cannot contain ';' (semi-colon) characters

input.name: Collection Name
input.narrative: The name of the collection whose rows are to be counted

output.name: Count
output.narrative: The number of rows counted in the collection

field.name: Item ID
field.description: The Item ID of the work queue item

input.name: Queue Name
input.narrative: The name of the queue for which the pending items are required

input.name: Key Filter
input.narrative: Optionally, a key value to filter by. Only items with this key value will be considered.

input.name: Tag Filter
input.narrative: Optionally, a tag mask to filter by. The tag should be in the format : ."+wanted tag; -unwanted tag ; other wanted tag". Wildcards can be used in the form of '*' or '?' for 'any chars' and 'any single char' respectively

input.name: Maximum
input.narrative: Optionally, the maximum number of items to return. Default is to return all items

input.name: Skip
input.narrative: Optionally, the number of items to skip before returning. Default is zero, ie. return all items from the head of the queue

output.name: Pending Items
output.narrative: The currently pending items in the queue, referenced by ID. The single column is 'Item ID' : text. The elements in the collection will be in the order in which they will be loaded by the 'Get Next Item' action.

input.name: Collection Name
input.narrative: The name of the collection whose rows are to be counted

output.name: Count
output.narrative: The number of rows counted in the collection

stage.name: Process Only Items From This Session

decision.expression: [Add Items] and [Process Items] and [Process Only Items From This Session]
